text: Ti duvai samuhako bicama e'uta parada (avarana) hunecha ra araphamathi dherai manisaharu hunechan. Yiniharule sabaila'i tinaka anuharabata nai cinne chan ra tiniharule jannatavalaharula'i thulo svarama pukarera bhanne chan ki, ‘‘timimathi santi hos.’’ Yi manisaharu ajhai jannatama pravesa pa'eka humdainan tara tyasako um'midavara hunechan
